targets.expr:
sum(label_replace(container_fs_usage_bytes{device=~"/dev.*"},"node_ip","$1","instance","(.*):.*")*on(node_ip) group_left(nodename) 
label_replace(node_uname_info{nodename=~"$nodes"},"node_ip","$1","instance","(.*):.*")) / sum(sum(avg(label_replace(
node_filesystem_size_bytes{device=~"/dev/.*"},
 "node_ip","$1","instance","(.*):.*")
*on(node_ip) group_left(nodename) label_replace(
node_uname_info{nodename=~"$nodes"},
"node_ip","$1","instance","(.*):.*")) by (device, nodename)) by (nodename))

sum(label_replace(container_fs_usage_bytes{device=~".*dockerlv"},"node_ip","$1","instance","(.*):.*")*on(node_ip) group_left(nodename) 
label_replace(node_uname_info{nodename=~"$nodes"},"node_ip","$1","instance","(.*):.*")) / sum(avg(label_replace(
node_filesystem_size_bytes{device=~".*dockerlv"},"node_ip","$1","instance","(.*):.*")
*on(node_ip) group_left(nodename) label_replace(
node_uname_info{nodename=~"$nodes"},
"node_ip","$1","instance","(.*):.*")) by (nodename))

sum(kube_pod_container_resource_requests_cpu_cores{container!="docker-build",node=~"$nodes"} and on(pod, namespace)( kube_pod_status_phase{ phase!="Succeeded"}==1 and kube_pod_status_phase{ phase!="Failed"}==1)) / sum(kube_node_status_allocatable_cpu_cores{node=~"$nodes"})

sum(kube_pod_container_resource_limits_cpu_cores{node=~"$nodes"}  and on(pod, namespace)( kube_pod_status_phase{ phase!="Succeeded"}==1 and kube_pod_status_phase{ phase!="Failed"}==1)) / sum(kube_node_status_allocatable_cpu_cores{node=~"$nodes"})

sum(kube_pod_container_resource_requests_memory_bytes{container!="docker-build",node=~"$nodes"} and on(pod, namespace)( kube_pod_status_phase{ phase!="Succeeded"}==1 and kube_pod_status_phase{ phase!="Failed"}==1)) / sum(kube_node_status_allocatable_memory_bytes{node=~"$nodes"})

sum(kube_pod_container_resource_limits_memory_bytes{node=~"$nodes"}  and on(pod, namespace)( kube_pod_status_phase{ phase!="Succeeded"}==1 and kube_pod_status_phase{ phase!="Failed"}==1)) / sum(kube_node_status_allocatable_memory_bytes{node=~"$nodes"})

sum(sum(avg(label_replace(
node_filesystem_size_bytes{device=~"/dev/.*"},
 "node_ip","$1","instance","(.*):.*")
*on(node_ip) group_left(nodename) label_replace(
node_uname_info{nodename=~"$nodes"},
"node_ip","$1","instance","(.*):.*")) by (device, nodename)) by (nodename))

sum(label_replace(container_fs_usage_bytes{device=~".*dockerlv"},"node_ip","$1","instance","(.*):.*")*on(node_ip) group_left(nodename) 
label_replace(node_uname_info{nodename=~"$nodes"},"node_ip","$1","instance","(.*):.*")) by (nodename) / avg(label_replace(
node_filesystem_size_bytes{device=~".*dockerlv"},
"node_ip","$1","instance","(.*):.*")
*on(node_ip) group_left(nodename) label_replace(node_uname_info{nodename=~"$nodes"},
"node_ip","$1","instance","(.*):.*")) by (nodename)

sum(label_replace(container_fs_usage_bytes{device=~"/dev.*"},"node_ip","$1","instance","(.*):.*")*on(node_ip) group_left(nodename) 
label_replace(node_uname_info{nodename=~"$nodes"},"node_ip","$1","instance","(.*):.*")) by (nodename) / sum(avg(label_replace(

 "node_ip","$1","instance","(.*):.*")
*on(node_ip) group_left(nodename) label_replace(
